entries.content:
User insight: Current CLI-based architecture creates unnecessary complexity. Should migrate to Anthropic SDK for:
- Native tool control (proactive permissions!)
- Direct interruption support
- No NDJSON parsing overhead
- Modern, maintained API
- Full conversation control

Plan: Document migration strategy now, execute after completing permission system. User estimates 1-2 days with proper architecture. Will build as new module for clean separation.

Session summary: Explored Claude Agent SDK as replacement for CLI architecture. Created 4 test scripts demonstrating streaming, tool usage, and permission callbacks. Key discovery: SDK has all tools built-in, permission system works via allowedTools (pre-approved) vs canUseTool callback (ask user). Successfully tested permission flow. Created comprehensive migration plan in docs/. User pausing here - will return to implement actual integration.
